name: xmas
description: It turns a spreadsheet of names and addresses into address labels.
author: landerton

scripts.labels: echo 🧝‍ The magic begins 🧝‍ && NODE_ENV=real node ./src/labels.js && echo 🎁 Here is your address labels 🎁 && echo 🎄 Merry fucking Christmas 🎄
scripts.returns: echo 🧝‍ The magic begins 🧝‍ && NODE_ENV=real node ./src/returns.js && echo 🎁 Here is your return labels 🎁 && echo 🎄 Merry fucking Christmas 🎄
scripts.example: echo 🧝‍ The magic begins 🧝‍ && NODE_ENV=example node ./src/labels.js && echo 🎁 Here is your fake labels 🎁 && echo 🎄 You probably don\'t have real friends anyways 🎄
